## Journals

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: asis
for (pub in pubs) {
  cat(sprintf("::: {.pub-card}\n[%d] [%s](%s)\n\n%s\n\n**%s** (%d)", pub$id, pub$title, pub$url, pub$authors, pub$journal, pub$year))
  if (!is.null(pub$volume) && !is.null(pub$pages)) cat(sprintf(" %s: %s", pub$volume, pub$pages))
  else if (!is.null(pub$volume)) cat(sprintf(" %s", pub$volume))
  
  cat("\n\n")
  all_links <- c()
  if (!is.null(pub$threads) && length(pub$threads) > 0) all_links <- c(all_links, sprintf("[%s](%s)", sapply(pub$threads, function(x) x$label), sapply(pub$threads, function(x) x$url)))
  if (!is.null(pub$notes) && length(pub$notes) > 0) all_links <- c(all_links, sprintf("[%s](%s)", sapply(pub$notes, function(x) x$label), sapply(pub$notes, function(x) x$url)))
  if (length(all_links) > 0) cat(paste(all_links, collapse=" &nbsp; "), "\n")
  
  cat(":::\n\n")
}
```
